basics.name: Matthew Stoney
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am a Software Engineer currently working as a contractor on Experian's Global ESS Team.

highlights: Develop, maintain, and update robust Python tooling to facilitate global platform migrations.
Lead the provisioning and configuration of over 50 client environments on AWS Kubernetes.
Author and/or revise Javascript code for testing REST APIs with Postman.
Collaborate closely with a global, cross-functional team, ensuring effective communication and problem-solving in a complex migration project.

work.summary: Summer internship on the Platform Engineering team.
highlights: Architect and construct robust full-stack applications using Go, JavaScript, React, gRPC, and GraphQL to locate and visualize any faults in the network topology.
Achieve net cost savings of $10,000 to $100,000 per network outage and improved uptime.
Merge 100+ Git commits into the Web Monorepo within 3 months.
Showcased project in a 30-minute presentation to an audience of 20+ team members, stakeholders, managers, and developers.
Full-scale frontend renovation of client webpage.
Design website layout with Adobe XD and Figma.
Code layout and features in HTML/CSS/Javascript
Create and edit graphics and logos using Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Honors given to students for exemplary academic achievements.

awards.title: Good Dad Award
awards.summary: My kid said to me, 'Dada, you are a good dada.' <3
